dataset_name: ClimateTRACE Road Transportation Emissions
methodology_description: Hybrid emissions estimate model with two parts. 1. ML models trained to predict road transport activity 2. emission factors pipeline to convert activity to emissions.

dataset_name: ClimateTRACE Oil and Gas Refining Emissions
methodology_description: ClimateTRACE uses a hybrid model to estimate emissions globally

dataset_name: ClimateTRACE Oil and Gas Production and Transport Emissions
methodology_description: ClimateTRACE uses a hybrid model to estimate emissions globally

dataset_name: ClimateTRACE Coal Mining Emissions
methodology_description: Estimate emissions from mining and quarrying extraction on a statistical basis by taking production numbers at national and facility level and applying specific emissions factors.

dataset_name: ClimateTRACE International Aviation Emissions
methodology_description: Emissions estimated based on fuel consumption.

dataset_name: ClimateTRACE Domestic Aviation Emissions
methodology_description: Emissions estimated based on fuel consumption.

dataset_name: ClimateTRACE Solid Waste Disposal Emissions
methodology_description: ClimateTRACE sought to combine the best available sources into a model that could be deployed globally to estimate emissions.

dataset_name: ClimateTRACE Manure Management Emissions
methodology_description: Approach relies on the hypothesis that beef or daily facility area size can be used as a predictor to estimate the total cattle population, which can then be used to estimate manure management emissions.

dataset_name: ClimateTRACE Enteric Fermentation Emissions
methodology_description: Approach relies on the hypothesis that beef or daily facility area size can be used as a predictor to estimate the total cattle population, which can then be used to estimate enteric fermentation emissions.

dataset_name: Carbon Monitor Cities
methodology_description: Carbon Monitor Cities is a global initiative to provide real-time and historical data on CO2 emissions from cities around the world. The data is based on satellite observations of CO2 concentrations and a data-driven model to estimate emissions.
